entry.title: https://github.com/elementary/terminal
entry.content: Terminal emulator designed for elementary OS

entry.title: https://github.com/ErikReider/SwayNotificationCenter
entry.content: A simple GTK based notification daemon for SwayWM

entry.title: https://github.com/linuxmint/timeshift
entry.content: System restore tool for Linux. Creates filesystem snapshots using rsync+hardlinks, or BTRFS snapshots. Supports scheduled snapshots, multiple backup levels, and exclude filters. Snapshots can be restored while system is running or from Live CD/USB.

entry.title: https://github.com/pantheon-tweaks/pantheon-tweaks
entry.content: A system customization app for the Pantheon desktop environment.

entry.title: https://github.com/alainm23/planify
entry.content: Task manager with Todoist & Nextcloud support designed for GNOME

entry.title: https://github.com/Aylur/astal
entry.content: Building blocks for creating custom desktop shells
